column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was the first stop when my friend and I arrived in Chicago. Literally
column3: put our luggage in our hotel
column4: and then walked here. This place is an institution in Chicago
column5: so we knew we had to go there. We got the Lou Malnati's deep dish
column7: it was a little disappointing. The crust was just ok
column8: the toppings were a little sparse
column9: but the marinara sauce was great.
